creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: flat planes of color with embossing; brown lantern in foreground, smaller lantern in background at left center; orange leaves on tree; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks: in left margin, embossed: inscription LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [Two Lanterns]; L
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
title: Two Lanterns
